nodes.content:
\label{lem:conjugate}
The subgroup of $\pi_1(\Sg\setminus\{x_1,\ldots,x_{n-1}\},x_n)$ generated by simple loops that bound an embedded disk is a normal subgroup.
nodes.content_preview: The subgroup of _1(x_1,,x_n-1,x_n) generated by simple loops that bound an embedded disk is a normal subgroup.
nodes.label: lem:conjugate
